data.message: Facebook why is the news fee choice stuck on Top Stories? I have to change it to Most Recent every single time I come back to my page.

replies.message: Hi Judie. There are many ways you can adjust what you see in your News Feed such as following or unfollowing friends or choosing to see fewer stories from a person, Page or group that you follow. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2qL8kbz. We've found that many people have a better experience when they can tell us what they'd like to see. If there is something we can do to improve your News Feed experience, please let us know at: http://bit.ly/2qL0T42. -William
Thank you for your reply, Facebook. I've adjusted my own news feed preference, I just want the choice between Top Stories or Most Recent to remain once I make the choice. At least for the day.
